result.trip_overview_narrative: Singapore American School offers experiential learning programs across all divisions that include field trips, Classroom Without Walls, and Interim Semester. These off-campus experiences occur both within Singapore and internationally, aiming to turn cultural knowledge into action.

evidence.quote: Field trips. Classroom Without Walls. Interim Semester. The off-campus experience at SAS—whether within Singapore or internationally—is about turning cultural knowledge into action. Possibilities abound with our experiential learning programs across all divisions.

Field trips. Classroom Without Walls. Interim Semester. The off-campus experience at SAS is about turning cultural knowledge into action. Possibilities abound with our experiential learning programs across all divisions.
